t: Amazon.com: MAGMA Products, A10-360L 10 Piece Gourmet Nesting Stainless Steel Cookware, Gas, Electric or Ceramic Cooktops : Home & Kitchen
s: This set is very high quality and very well made. Nice and heavy, the cookware heats evenly and does a great job. I called Magma and was told the handles are heat resistant, but are not flame proof. Also, as stated in the literature, the pots/pans aren't designed to work on higher heats.
